channel.title: Nhaka yevaShona
channel.itunes:subtitle: A detailed history and culture of the Shona people of Zimbabwe
channel.itunes:author: K. Chikuse
channel.description: A detailed history and culture of the Shona people of Zimbabwe

item.title: The Shona People
item.itunes:author: K. Chikuse
item.itunes:subtitle: The Shona People
item.itunes:summary: The Shona are a cluster of peoples who have lived for about 2,000 years in Zimbabwe

item.title: Chaminuka
item.itunes:author: K. Chikuse
item.itunes:subtitle: The life of Chaminuka
item.itunes:summary: A famous seer from Chitungwiza, a man of unusual gifts, with power over animals

item.title: The Rozvi Empire
item.itunes:author: K. Chikuse
item.itunes:subtitle: The Rozvi Empire
item.itunes:summary: The Rozvi empire was established on the Zimbabwean Plateau in the 1600s

item.title: Gumboreshumba
item.itunes:author: K. Chikuse
item.itunes:subtitle: Gumboreshumba
item.itunes:summary: A spirit medium instrumental in organizing the first nationwide resistance to colonial rule
